### Tender Announcement for Die Bonder (Bonder de Puces) Public Works and Procurement Services

#### Notice Type
This is an Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN) under the Canada Trade Agreement (CTA).

#### Notice Details
| Field          | Description                                                                            |
| :------------- | :------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ |
| Reference Number | cb-392-734254                                                                    |
| Reference Title | Die Bonder (Bonder de Puces)                                                         |
| Solicitation Number | 23-58184                                                                            |
| Publication Date | December 06, 2023                                                                    |
| Closing Date    | 14:00:00 on December 21, 2023                                                       |
| Expected Contract Start | January 05, 2024                                                                 |
| Expected Contract End | March 29, 2024                                                                      |
| Contract Value | Not specified                                                                           |

#### Contract Description
The National Research Council Canada (NRC) has a requirement for the delivery of a Die Bonder for its Advanced Electronics and Photonics Research Centre in Ottawa, Ontario. 

#### Statement of Capabilities
Suppliers who consider themselves fully qualified to provide the required goods and services may submit a statement of capabilities in writing, no later than the closing date. The statement must clearly demonstrate how the supplier meets the advertised requirements.

#### Contact Information
Sylvianne Beaulne
Procurement Team Lead
Directorate of Finance and Procurement Services
National Research Council Canada
Telephone: 343-553-1211
Email: [sylvianne.beaulne@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca](mailto:sylvianne.beaulne@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca)

#### Tender Documentation
The full tender notice can be downloaded at the following URL: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/26871/23-58184-_-acan.pdf

Note to Potential Bidders: If you are interested in this procurement opportunity, please submit a statement of capabilities in writing to the contact person above. Please refer to the uploaded tender document for complete details.
